name: link-previewer
description: Preview links in a popup without leaving your current page

scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r Common/* dist/ && cp -r Chrome/* dist/
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cp -r Common/* dist/ && cp -r Firefox/* dist/ && find ./dist -type f -name '*.js' -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i 's/chrome/browser/g'
